title: End of Nations: EU Takeover & The Lisbon Treaty
description:
A group of young Irishmen set out to make a video about the pros and cons of the 
Lisbon Treaty and found out to their horror the lies, manipulations and deceit behind the EU. From MEPs, legal experts and EU researches the true nature of the EU unfolded, how it really operates from behind closed doors and away from prying eyes. 

They discovered the massive power grab away from citizens and nations to the elites 
that is being proposed in this treaty. Most shocking of all was how their elected 
representatives are willingly handing them over to this emerging Totalitarian 
Superstate by deception, propaganda and outright lies. 

This video details how the structures of the EU really operate, what the full 
significance of the Lisbon Treaty is and how it is the end of Nations within in the 
EU. MEPs describe their experience in Brussels and how they are undermined by the real power of the unelected and unaccountable Eurocrats who run the organization. How the politicians are working together for their own selfish needs while being used for a bigger agenda.

Watch: http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-4291770489472554607
